information_gathering.description: Coletar informações sobre o deck inimigo

moves.reasoning: Ganhar informação sobre o deck inimigo
Não gastar todo elixir de uma vez

win_condition_commitment.description: Comprometer win conditions no momento certo

moves.reasoning: Jogar win condition quando há vantagem

deck_reading.description: Ler o deck inimigo baseado nas cartas jogadas

moves.reasoning: Manter counter específico para carta esperada

bait_strategies.description: Estratégias de isca para forçar spells

moves.reasoning: Usar spells quando inimigo está seco

even_state.description: Estratégias quando o jogo está equilibrado

giant.strategy: Use high DPS single target units or swarm to distract

musketeer.strategy: Use spells or flying units to eliminate

archers.strategy: Area damage spells or flying units

knight.strategy: High DPS units or swarm to overwhelm

minipekka.strategy: Swarm units to distract or cheap units to kite

minions.strategy: Anti-air units or area damage spells

fireball.strategy: Cannot be countered - avoid grouping units

spear_goblins.strategy: Any area damage or single unit

wizard.strategy: Spells or fast units to reach quickly

witch.strategy: Spells or units that can reach her quickly

pekka.strategy: Swarm units to distract or air units

balloon.strategy: High DPS air targeting units immediately

skeleton_army.strategy: Any area damage spell or splash damage unit

barbarians.strategy: Area damage spells or splash units

hog_rider.strategy: Buildings to distract or high DPS units

golem.strategy: High DPS single target or inferno units

emergency_defense.description: In emergency, any unit can defend

elixir_advantage.description: Can afford expensive but effective counters

giant.notes: Tank principal, precisa ser defendido no centro com support killers

musketeer.notes: Dano aéreo importante, priorizar spells para eliminar

witch.notes: Suporte forte, eliminar com spells ou valkyrie

baby_dragon.notes: Unidade aérea, usar ranged troops ou air counters

knight.notes: Tank barato, usar ranged troops para eliminar

archers.notes: Ranged troops frágeis, eliminar com spells

minipekka.notes: Dano alto, usar swarm troops ou spells

minions.notes: Swarm aéreo, eliminar com spells ou ranged troops

bats.notes: Swarm aéreo barato, eliminar com spells

goblin_barrel.notes: Spell de dano direto, usar spells para eliminar

cannon.notes: Construção defensiva, usar spells ou tank troops

fireball.notes: Spell de área, espalhar tropas para minimizar dano

zap.notes: Spell rápido, espalhar tropas para minimizar dano

arrows.notes: Spell de área, espalhar tropas para minimizar dano

hog_rider.notes: Win condition terrestre, usar buildings ou tank troops

balloon.notes: Win condition aérea, usar ranged troops ou air counters

pekka.notes: Tank pesado, usar swarm troops para eliminar

valkyrie.notes: Controle de área, usar tank troops ou spells

wizard.notes: Suporte de área, eliminar com spells ou tank troops

inferno_tower.notes: Construção defensiva forte, usar spells para resetar

tesla.notes: Construção defensiva, usar spells para eliminar

bomb_tower.notes: Construção defensiva de área, usar spells para eliminar

elixir_collector.notes: Construção de elixir, priorizar eliminação com spells

freeze.notes: Spell de controle, espalhar tropas para minimizar efeito

poison.notes: Spell de área duradouro, espalhar tropas para minimizar dano

lightning.notes: Spell de área forte, espalhar tropas para minimizar dano

rocket.notes: Spell de dano direto, espalhar tropas para minimizar dano

log.notes: Spell terrestre, usar tropas aéreas para evitar

earthquake.notes: Spell anti-building, usar tropas aéreas para evitar

rage.notes: Spell de buff, espalhar tropas para minimizar efeito

heal.notes: Spell de cura, usar spells para eliminar tropas curadas

mirror.notes: Spell de cópia, adaptar estratégia baseado na carta copiada

what_is_cycling.description: Ciclar é jogar cartas rapidamente para chegar na carta desejada

offensive_cycling.description: Ciclar para aplicar pressão ou encontrar win condition

information_cycling.description: Ciclar para ganhar informações sobre o deck inimigo

optimal_moments.description: Ciclar antes do inimigo fazer push

efficient_cycling.description: Sempre jogar a carta mais barata primeiro
Posicionar cartas de ciclo em posições seguras
Ciclar com cartas que também defendem

variables.time_bonus: Elixir ganho por tempo (0.1 por segundo)

enemy_units.description: Análise das unidades inimigas no campo

our_units.description: Análise das nossas unidades no campo

find_tower_position.description: Encontra posição para dano na torre

positive_trades.description: Trades que geram vantagem de elixir

neutral_trades.description: Trades que mantêm equilíbrio de elixir

negative_trades.description: Trades que geram desvantagem de elixir

backline_defense.description: Linha de trás para ranged troops

offensive_push.description: Win condition na frente, suporte atrás

general_rules.tank_first: Sempre jogar tank antes do suporte
general_rules.spells_center: Spells no centro para máximo alcance
general_rules.buildings_center: Buildings no centro para atrair tropas

chess_moves.description: Jogar carta mais barata para ciclar e ganhar informação
Posicionar defesa no centro para controlar o campo

spell_cycle.description: Ciclo com Fireball para dano direto

defensive_adaptation.description: Adaptação de cartas ofensivas para defesa

minions_vs_ground.adaptation: Use minions defensively against ground troops

giant_as_tank.adaptation: Use giant as defensive tank to absorb damage

wait_and_strike.description: Aguardar momento ideal para big push

giant.usage: Jogar no bridge para iniciar push

musketeer.purpose: Dano aéreo e terrestre, suporte de longo alcance
musketeer.usage: Posicionar atrás de tank ou para defender

minipekka.purpose: Counter de tanks e dano alto
minipekka.usage: Defender contra tanks ou push ofensivo

fireball.purpose: Dano de área, eliminar grupos de tropas
fireball.usage: Usar em grupos de tropas ou para dano na torre

zap.purpose: Stun e dano baixo, resetar inferno
zap.usage: Stun tropas ou resetar inferno tower/dragon

knight.usage: Defender contra tropas únicas ou counter

archers.purpose: Suporte barato, dano aéreo e terrestre
archers.usage: Suporte de longo alcance ou defesa barata

spear_goblins.purpose: Carta mais barata para cycle e defesa

goblin_barrel.usage: Dano na torre ou bait de spells

melee_vs_ranged_rules.description: Regras fundamentais de interação entre tropas melee e ranged

basic_rules.melee_advantage: Tropas melee ganham se conseguirem chegar perto
basic_rules.ranged_advantage: Tropas ranged ganham se mantiverem distância
basic_rules.positioning_critical: Posicionamento determina o resultado da luta

musketeer_placed_on_minipekka.reason: Mini Pekka one-shots Musketeer in melee range

musketeer_placed_at_distance.reason: Musketeer can kite and kill Mini Pekka from distance

minipekka_vs_musketeer.correct_counter: Place Musketeer 3+ tiles away from Mini Pekka, never on top

archers_placed_on_knight.reason: Knight has splash damage and more HP

archers_placed_at_distance.reason: Archers can kite Knight and deal damage safely

giant_vs_minipekka.reason: Mini Pekka is designed to counter tanks
giant_vs_minipekka.positioning: Place Mini Pekka directly on Giant's path

positioning_rules.vs_grouped_troops: Center of group for maximum damage
positioning_rules.vs_tower_damage: Direct on tower when low HP

melee_troops.vs_ranged: Get close quickly or use cover

kiting.definition: Usar tropas para atrair inimigos longe do objetivo

musketeer_kiting_giant.method: Place Musketeer 4+ tiles away from Giant
musketeer_kiting_giant.outcome: Giant follows Musketeer, moves away from tower

archers_kiting_pekka.method: Place Archers at distance, let PEKKA chase
archers_kiting_pekka.outcome: PEKKA wastes time chasing, takes damage

flanking.rule: Attack from different angle than main threat

never_cycle_expensive.reason: Too valuable to waste on cycling

archers.positioning: Behind tank or at safe distance

minions.positioning: Above enemy troops to avoid ground damage

giant.purpose: Absorb damage while support deals damage

fireball.targets: Grouped troops 4+ elixir value, low HP towers
fireball.never_target: Single low-value troops, cycling, own towers
fireball.positioning: Center of enemy group or direct tower hit

spear_goblins.positioning: Safe distance for cycle, front for distraction

defensive.description: Foco principal em defender as torres e gerar vantagem de elixir.

sub_states.passive_defense: Defender com cartas de baixo custo e posicionamento seguro.
sub_states.elixir_advantage_building: Focar em trades positivos de elixir.

transition_conditions.to_offensive: Elixir advantage >= 3 AND enemy tower HP < our tower HP OR enemy win condition played AND we have strong counter.
transition_conditions.to_counter_push: Successful defense AND our troops survived with high HP.

offensive.description: Foco principal em atacar as torres inimigas e aplicar pressão.

sub_states.slow_push: Construir um push forte a partir de trás da torre do rei.
sub_states.fast_push: Atacar rapidamente com cartas de alto dano no bridge.
sub_states.spell_cycle_pressure: Usar feitiços para dano direto na torre e forçar reações.

transition_conditions.to_defensive: Elixir disadvantage >= 3 OR enemy has strong counter to our push OR our tower HP is low.

counter_push.description: Transição rápida de defesa para ataque, aproveitando tropas sobreviventes.

sub_states.single_lane_counter: Aproveitar tropas em uma lane para um push rápido.
sub_states.split_lane_counter: Dividir tropas para pressionar ambas as lanes.

transition_conditions.to_offensive: Counter push is strong AND enemy is low on elixir.
transition_conditions.to_defensive: Counter push is weak OR enemy defends effectively.

elixir_management.description: Gerenciamento do elixir para otimizar o ciclo de cartas e a vantagem.

sub_states.passive_elixir_gain: Esperar o elixir encher no início do jogo ou após um grande push.
sub_states.aggressive_elixir_trades: Buscar trocas de elixir positivas ativamente.

transition_conditions.to_defensive: Enemy plays a card and we need to react.
transition_conditions.to_offensive: Elixir is full AND we have a strong hand.

card_cycle.description: Foco em ciclar cartas para encontrar a mão ideal ou a win condition.

sub_states.cheap_cycle: Usar cartas de baixo custo para ciclar rapidamente.
sub_states.win_condition_fishing: Ciclar para encontrar a win condition e suas cartas de suporte.

emergency_defense.description: Reação rápida a ameaças iminentes à torre.

sub_states.tower_protection: Defender a torre a todo custo.
sub_states.king_tower_activation: Ativar a torre do rei para defesa adicional.

global_transition_rules.condition: Enemy win condition directly threatening tower AND low elixir.

global_transition_rules.to_offensive: Elixir advantage >= 3 AND our win condition is in hand.

global_transition_rules.to_defensive: Enemy counter-attack is strong AND our elixir is low.

global_transition_rules.to_elixir_management: Elixir is full AND no immediate threat or opportunity.

global_transition_rules.to_card_cycle: Desired card is not in hand AND no immediate threat or opportunity.

Knight.description: A tough melee fighter. The Barbarian's handsome, cultured cousin. Rumor has it that he was knighted based on the sheer awesomeness of his mustache alone.

counters.strategy: High DPS units or swarm to overwhelm

Archers.description: A pair of lightly armored ranged attackers. They'll help you take down ground and air units, but you're on your own with hair coloring advice.

counters.strategy: Area damage spells or flying units

Goblins.description: Four fast, unarmored melee attackers. Small, fast, green and mean!

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Giant.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. A real one-man wrecking crew!

counters.strategy: Use high DPS single target units or swarm to distract

offensive.bridge: drop at the bridge to force immediate response

P.E.K.K.A.description: A heavily armored, slow melee fighter. Swings from the hip, but packs a huge punch.

counters.strategy: Swarm units to distract or air units

Minions.description: Three fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, minions are blue, they can fly, and will crush you!

counters.strategy: Anti-air units or area damage spells

Balloon.description: As pretty as they are, you won't want a parade of THESE balloons showing up on the horizon. Drops powerful bombs and when shot down, crashes dealing area damage.

counters.strategy: High DPS air targeting units immediately

Witch.description: Summons Skeletons, shoots destructo beams, has glowing pink eyes that unfortunately don't shoot lasers.

counters.strategy: Spells or units that can reach her quickly

Barbarians.description: A horde of melee attackers with mean mustaches and even meaner tempers.

counters.strategy: Area damage spells or splash units

Golem.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. When destroyed, explosively splits into two Golemites and deals area damage!

counters.strategy: High DPS single target or inferno units

offensive.bridge: drop at the bridge to force immediate response

Skeletons.description: Three fast, very weak melee fighters. Surround your enemies with this pile of bones!

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Valkyrie.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Skeleton Army.description: Spawns an army of Skeletons. Meet Larry and his friends Harry, Gerry, Terry, Mary, etc.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Bomber.description: Small, lightly protected skeleton who throws bombs. Deals area damage that can wipe out a swarm of enemies.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Musketeer.description: Don't be fooled by her delicately coiffed hair, the Musketeer is a mean shot with her trusty boomstick.

counters.strategy: Use spells or flying units to eliminate

Baby Dragon.description: Burps fireballs from the sky that deal area damage. Baby dragons hatch cute, hungry and ready for a barbeque.

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Prince.description: Don't let the little pony fool you. Once the Prince gets a running start, you WILL be trampled. Deals double damage once he gets charging.

Wizard.description: The most awesome man to ever set foot in the Arena, the Wizard will blow you away with his handsomeness... and/or fireballs.

counters.strategy: Spells or fast units to reach quickly

Mini P.E.K.K.A.description: The Arena is a certified butterfly-free zone. No distractions for P.E.K.K.A, only destruction.

counters.strategy: Swarm units to distract or cheap units to kite

Spear Goblins.description: Three unarmored ranged attackers. Who the heck taught these guys to throw spears!? Who thought that was a good idea?!

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Giant Skeleton.description: The bigger the skeleton, the bigger the bomb. Carries a bomb that blows up when the Giant Skeleton dies.

Hog Rider.description: Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of "Hog Riderrrrr" all the way through the Arena doors.

Minion Horde.description: Six fast, unarmored flying attackers. Three's a crowd, six is a horde!

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Ice Wizard.description: This chill caster throws ice shards that slow down enemies' movement and attack speed. Despite being freezing cold, he has a handlebar mustache that's too hot for TV.

Royal Giant.description: Destroying enemy buildings with his massive cannon is his job; making a raggedy blond beard look good is his passion.

Guards.description: Three ruthless bone brothers with shields. Knock off their shields and all that's left are three ruthless bone brothers.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Princess.description: This stunning Princess shoots flaming arrows from long range. If you're feeling warm feelings towards her, it's probably because you're on fire.

Dark Prince.description: The Dark Prince deals area damage and lets his spiked club do the talking for him - because when he does talk, it sounds like he has a bucket on his head.

Three Musketeers.description: Trio of powerful, independent markswomen, fighting for justice and honor. Disrespecting them would not be just a mistake, it would be a cardinal sin!

Lava Hound.description: The Lava Hound is a majestic flying beast that attacks buildings. The Lava Pups are less majestic angry babies that attack anything.

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Ice Spirit.description: Spawns one lively little Ice Spirit to freeze a group of enemies. Stay frosty.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Fire Spirit.description: The Fire Spirit is on a kamikaze mission to give you a warm hug. It'd be adorable if it wasn't on fire.

Miner.description: The Miner can burrow his way underground and appear anywhere in the Arena. It's not magic, it's a shovel. A shovel that deals reduced damage to Crown Towers.

Sparky.description: Sparky slowly charges up, then unloads MASSIVE area damage. Overkill isn't in her vocabulary.

Bowler.description: This big blue dude digs the simple things in life - Dark Elixir drinks and throwing rocks. His massive boulders roll through their target, hitting everything behind for a strike!

Lumberjack.description: He chops trees by day and hunts The Log by night. His bottle of Rage spills everywhere when he's defeated.

Battle Ram.description: Two Barbarians holding a big log charge at the nearest building, dealing significant damage if they connect; then they go to town with their swords!

Inferno Dragon.description: Shoots a focused beam of fire that increases in damage over time. Wears a helmet because flying can be dangerous.

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Ice Golem.description: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Made entirely out of ice... or is he?! Yes.

Mega Minion.description: Flying, armored and powerful. What could be its weakness?! Cupcakes.

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Dart Goblin.description: Runs fast, shoots far and chews gum. How does he blow darts with a mouthful of Double Trouble Gum? Years of didgeridoo lessons.

Goblin Gang.description: Spawns six Goblins - three with knives, three with spears - at a discounted Elixir cost. It's like a Goblin Value Pack!

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Electro Wizard.description: He lands with a "POW!", stuns nearby enemies and shoots lightning with both hands! What a show off.

Elite Barbarians.description: Spawns a pair of leveled up Barbarians. They're like regular Barbarians, only harder, better, faster and stronger.

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Hunter.description: He deals BIG damage up close - not so much at range. What he lacks in accuracy, he makes up for with his impressively bushy eyebrows.

Executioner.description: He throws his axe like a boomerang, striking all enemies on the way out AND back. It's a miracle he doesn't lose an arm.

Bandit.description: The Bandit dashes to her target and delivers an extra big hit! While dashing, she can't be touched. The mask keeps her identity safe, and gives her bonus cool points!

Royal Recruits.description: Deploys a line of recruits armed with spears, shields and wooden buckets. They dream of ponies and one day wearing metal buckets.

Night Witch.description: Summons Bats to do her bidding! If you get too close, she's not afraid of pitching in with her mean-looking battle staff.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Bats.description: Spawns a handful of tiny flying creatures. Think of them as sweet, purple... balls of DESTRUCTION!

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Royal Ghost.description: He drifts invisibly through the Arena until he's startled by an enemy... then he attacks! Then he's invisible again! Zzzz.

Ram Rider.description: Together they charge through the Arena; snaring enemies, knocking down towers ... and chewing grass!?

Zappies.description: Spawns a pack of miniature Zap machines. Who controls them...? Only the Master Builder knows.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Rascals.description: Spawns a mischievous trio of Rascals! The boy takes the lead, while the girls pelt enemies from behind... with slingshots full of Double Trouble Gum!

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Cannon Cart.description: A Cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! Once you break its shield, it becomes a Cannon not on wheels.

Mega Knight.description: He lands with the force of 1,000 mustaches, then jumps from one foe to the next dealing huge area damage. Stand aside!

Skeleton Barrel.description: It's a Skeleton party in the sky, until all the balloons pop... then it's a Skeleton party on the ground!

Flying Machine.description: The Master Builder has sent his first contraption to the Arena! It's a fast and fun flying machine, but fragile!

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Wall Breakers.description: A daring duo of dangerous dive bombers. Nothing warms a Wall Breaker's cold and undead heart like blowing up buildings.

Royal Hogs.description: The King's personal pets are loose! They love to chomp on apples and towers alike - who let the hogs out?!

Goblin Giant.description: This jolly green Goblin Giant stomps towards enemy buildings. He carries two Spear Goblins everywhere he goes. It's a weird but functional arrangement.

Fisherman.description: His Ranged Attack can pull enemies towards him, and pull himself to enemy buildings. He's also mastered the ancient art of 'Fish Slapping'.

Magic Archer.description: Not quite a Wizard, nor an Archer - he shoots a magic arrow that passes through and damages all enemies in its path. It's not a trick, it's magic!

Electro Dragon.description: Spits out bolts of electricity hitting up to three targets. Suffers from middle child syndrome to boot.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Firecracker.description: Shoots a firework that explodes upon impact, damaging the target and showering anything directly behind it with sparks. This is what happens when Archers get bored!

Mighty Miner.description:
Walk softly ... and carry a big drill!

This Champion deals increasing Damage to his target and can switch lanes to escape combat or change attack plans.

This makes him not only the mightiest, but also the sneakiest Miner in the Arena.

Super Witch.description: Summons Skeletons, shoots destructo beams, has glowing pink eyes that unfortunately don't shoot lasers.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Elixir Golem.description: Splits into two Elixir Golemites when destroyed, which split into two sentient Blobs when defeated. Each part of the Elixir Golem gives your opponent some Elixir when destroyed!

Battle Healer.description: With each attack, she unleashes a powerful healing aura that restores Hitpoints to herself and friendly Troops. When she isn't attacking, she passively heals herself!

Skeleton King.description: The King of the undead himself. He sometimes feels lonely (could be due to his non flattering features) and will summon friends to join him in the battle even after death. Tough guys have feelings too!

Super Lava Hound.description: The Lava Hound is a majestic flying beast that attacks buildings. The Lava Pups are less majestic angry babies that attack anything.

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Super Magic Archer.description: Not quite a Wizard, nor an Archer - he shoots a magic arrow that passes through and damages all enemies in its path. It's not a trick, it's magic!

Archer Queen.description: She is fast, deadly and hard to catch. Beware of her crossbow bolts and try not to blink - you might miss her!

Santa Hog Rider.description: Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of "Hog Riderrrrr" all the way through the Arena doors.

Golden Knight.description: A warrior with luxurious hair and outstanding flexibility. Demonstrates his aerobics skills on demand.

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Super Ice Golem.description: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Made entirely out of ice... or is he?! Yes.

Monk.description:
Monk has spent many isolated years perfecting a new style of combat.

He fires off a 3-hit combo, with the last blow dealing extra Damage and pushing enemies back!

Super Archers.description: A pair of lightly armored ranged attackers. They'll help you take down ground and air units, but you're on your own with hair coloring advice.

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Skeleton Dragons.description: This pair of skeletal scorchers deal Area Damage and fly above the Arena. They also play a mean rib cage xylophone duet.

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Terry.description: Terry and his trusty companion Pim Pim bring their unconventional Hog Riding skills to the Arena!

Super Mini P.E.K.K.A.description: The Arena is a certified butterfly-free zone. No distractions for P.E.K.K.A, only destruction.

Mother Witch.description:
Places a curse on enemy Troops with each attack. When a cursed Troop is destroyed, it turns into a building-targeting Hog that fights alongside the Mother Witch!

She also bakes great cookies.

Electro Spirit.description: Jumps on enemies, dealing Area Damage and stunning up to 9 enemy Troops. Locked in an eternal battle with Knight for the best mustache.

Electro Giant.description:
He channels electricity through his Zap Pack, a unique device that stuns and damages any Troop attacking him within its range.

Don't tell him that his finger guns aren't real! He'll zap you.

Raging Prince.description: Don't let the little pony fool you. Once the Prince gets a running start, you WILL be trampled. Deals double damage once he gets charging.

Phoenix.description:
This mystical creature will be reborn as an egg when destroyed. If it hatches, it returns to the fight! What an egg-cellent ability.

Being born again is tiring, so a hatched Phoenix will have slightly less Hitpoints and Damage (80% of its total).

Cannon.description: Defensive building. Shoots cannonballs with deadly effect, but cannot target flying troops.

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

Goblin Hut.description: Building that spawns Spear Goblins. Don't look inside... you don't want to see how they're made.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

Mortar.description: Defensive building with a long range. Shoots big boulders that deal area damage, but cannot hit targets that get too close!

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

Inferno Tower.description: Defensive building, roasts targets for damage that increases over time. Burns through even the biggest and toughest enemies!

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

Bomb Tower.description: Defensive building that houses a Bomber. Deals area damage to anything dumb enough to stand near it.

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

Barbarian Hut.description: Building that periodically spawns Barbarians to fight the enemy. Time to make the Barbarians!

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

Tesla.description: Defensive building. Whenever it's not zapping the enemy, the power of Electrickery is best kept grounded.

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

Elixir Collector.description: You gotta spend Elixir to make Elixir! This building makes 8 Elixir over its Lifetime. Does not appear in your starting hand.

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

X-Bow.description: Nice tower you got there. Would be a shame if this X-Bow whittled it down from this side of the Arena...

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

Tombstone.description: Building that periodically spawns Skeletons to fight the enemy... and when destroyed, spawns 4 more Skeletons! Creepy!

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

Furnace.description: The Furnace spawns one Fire Spirit at a time. It also makes great brick-oven pancakes.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

Goblin Cage.description: When the Goblin Cage is destroyed, a Goblin Brawler is unleashed into the Arena! Goblin Brawler always skips leg day.

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

Goblin Drill.description: Building capable of burrowing underground and appearing anywhere in the Arena. Spawns Goblins one at a time until destroyed. Then spawns a few more, to make sure everything nearby has been properly stabbed.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

Party Hut.description: Building that spawns Spear Goblins. Don't look inside... you don't want to see how they're made.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

defensive.center_pull: place at 4-2 tiles to pull building-target troops

Fireball.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

counters.strategy: Cannot be countered - avoid grouping units

Arrows.description: Arrows pepper a large area, damaging all enemies hit. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

Rage.description: Increases troop movement and attack speed. Buildings attack faster and summon troops quicker, too. Chaaaarge!

Rocket.description: Deals high damage to a small area. Looks really awesome doing it. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

Goblin Barrel.description: Spawns three Goblins anywhere in the Arena. It's going to be a thrilling ride, boys!

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Freeze.description: Freezes and damages enemy troops and buildings, making them unable to move or attack. Everybody chill. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

Mirror.description: Mirrors your last card played for +1 Elixir. Does not appear in your starting hand.

Lightning.description: Bolts of lightning damage and stun up to three enemy troops or buildings with the most hitpoints in the target area. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

counters.strategy: Use splash units or area spells to clear swarm quickly.

Zap.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

Poison.description: Covers the area in a deadly toxin, damaging enemy troops and buildings over time. Yet somehow leaves the grass green and healthy. Go figure! Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

Graveyard.description: Surprise! It's a party. A Skeleton party, anywhere in the Arena. Yay!

The Log.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path! Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

Tornado.description: Drags enemy troops to its center while dealing damage over time, just like a magnet. A big, swirling, Tornado-y magnet.

Clone.description: Duplicates all friendly troops in the target area. Cloned troops are fragile, but pack the same punch as the original! Doesn't affect buildings.

Earthquake.description: Deals Damage per second to Troops and Crown Towers. Deals huge Building Damage! Does not affect flying units (it is an EARTHquake, after all).

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Barbarian Barrel.description: It rolls over and damages anything in its path, then breaks open and out pops a Barbarian! How did he get inside?!

Heal Spirit.description:
A mischievous Spirit that leaps at enemies, dealing Damage and leaving behind a powerful healing effect that restores Hitpoints to friendly Troops!

R.I.P. Heal
2017 - 2020
Alas, we hardly used ye.

Giant Snowball.description: It's HUGE! Once it began rolling down Frozen Peak, there was no stopping it. Enemies hit are knocked back and slowed down. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

Royal Delivery.description:
No need to sign for this package!

Dropped from the sky, it deals Area Damage to enemy Troops before delivering a Royal Recruit.

The empty box is also handy for espionage.

counters.strategy: Use anti-air troops or spells; avoid placing single squishy supports alone.

Party Rocket.description: Deals high damage to a small area. Looks really awesome doing it. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

2.6 Hog Cycle.gameplan: Cycle rápido, pressão constante com Hog e defesa eficiente com Cannon + Musketeer.
starting_plays: Hog se tiver 5+ elixir e mão boa
counter_strategies: Bait o Tornado antes do Hog

Log Bait.gameplan: Forçar o Log com iscas e punir quando está fora de ciclo.

X-Bow 3.0.gameplan: Controle e defesa até travar uma X-Bow conectada.

Golem Beatdown.gameplan: Push lento com Golem de trás, suportado por splash e spells.
good_matchups: Cycle leves que não param Golem
starting_plays: Bar Barrel no bridge para ciclar

LavaLoon.gameplan: Empurrão aéreo com Lava tanqueando e Balloon causando dano.
starting_plays: Lava de trás se vantagem de elixir

Graveyard Control.gameplan: Defesa sólida e contra-ataque com Graveyard + Poison.
counter_strategies: Poison tido como resposta às swarms

P.E.K.K.A Bridge Spam.gameplan: Pressão nas pontes e punições rápidas em overcommit.

Royal Giant Fisherman.gameplan: RG na ponte quando vantagem de elixir, controlar tropas com Fisherman.
counter_strategies: RG no lado oposto ao push inimigo

Miner Control.gameplan: Controle e chip damage com Miner + Poison, punições com WB.

state_inference_rules.if: opponent_elixir_estimated <= 3 and we have bridge pressure cards in hand
we defended with surviving troops >= 6 elixir value
opponent plays Elixir Collector and we have Miner/Fireball
double elixir time and we have beatdown deck
our tower < 1000 hp and enemy has direct damage spells in cycle
